title: Can we get turrets to do % damage instead of flat damage
body: people are still buying like one item and then they can just walk in and kill you under your own turret and then leave with like  1/4 to 1/2 hp. there called turrets not tickle cannons that do no damage. best way to fix them is to make them do % damage to champs. that way u can balance them out. make them  do 20% damage to max hp then they half 5 seconds at max HP to turret dive not 15 seconds to turret dive and kill the whole fucking team.

replies.body: You could also beat your lane opponent so that he can't tower dive :)
not every game you win vs your opponent : )

Correct. You can, however, not lose so hard that you can get tower dove the vast majority of the time.
To be fair you don't actually have to win in order to prevent most tower dives.  All you have to do is not lose.
to also be fair you can be wining your lane and then get  ganked and then that could turn into a 2v1 turret dive

> [{quoted}](name=Attack On Asuna,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=t2AUPG9v,comment-id=0000000000020000,timestamp=2016-06-09T23:27:32.569+0000)
>
> to also be fair you can be wining your lane and then get  ganked and then that could turn into a 2v1 turret dive

If you can't win a 2v1 turret dive you deserve to get dunked. 

that's why you get less gold if they keep killing you, so if you play so poorly or get dunked on so hard there will be a penalty one way or another, the tower just makes sure they lose some extra hp in case you are just doing so poorly they aren't enough to help
That just means you didn't ward well, or didn't pay attention to your map.  Proper warding can get you away from that tower before reinforcements arrive.
Think of it as an opportunity for an easy double kill.

It does seem like no one is afraid of the turrets, which despite being phallic makes them unfortunately impotent.  I'm not saying it should be impossible to dive but it should be difficult otherwise why have them?.
I think if they change anything it should be to switch the pulse turrets (that can blast you even if you run out of range) to the last line of defense and those stupid "I only do a small amount of damage slowly to a single target" laser turrets to the front lines.

If you wanted a completely radical notion, I think it would be fun for the PVP aspect and overall strategy of the game to have the turrets buff Champs and minions instead of attacking.

you are there to defend your turrets, they are not there to defend you

If you cannot deal with a diving opponent then the problem most likely is not the turret

Anyways why shouldn't people be allowed to dive you?
In the early levels, the turret is supposed to protect you fairly well.  In the early levels, turret shots already do 20+% of the person's health though, so I think they're fine as is.

so the turrets are healing them k

knew i was missing something about this
nevere said they shouldnt but coming out with half hp after a tanking me and the turret for a good 10 seconds is really not balanced
